annapolis.neighborhoods: Downtown, Eastport, East Street, West Annapolis
annapolis.meetingHighlights: Naval Academy town recovery with waterfront meetings; diverse maritime community; strong sailing-sobriety culture.
annapolis.transitInfo: Annapolis Transit buses; BWI Marshall Airport (BWI) accessible; State Capital location.

baltimore.neighborhoods: Inner Harbor, Federal Hill, Fells Point, Canton, Mt. Vernon, Hampden
baltimore.meetingHighlights: Major recovery community with meetings throughout city neighborhoods; strong traditions in Fells Point and Mt. Vernon; 24/7 meeting culture.
baltimore.transitInfo: MTA Light Rail, Metro, and buses; BWI Marshall Airport (BWI); Amtrak service.

rockville.neighborhoods: Downtown Rockville, King Farm, Town Center, West End
rockville.meetingHighlights: Suburban DC recovery with professional community meetings; diverse schedule serving commuters; strong Montgomery County network.
rockville.transitInfo: Metro Red Line; Ride On buses; I-270 corridor; close to DC.

frederick.neighborhoods: Downtown Frederick, Carroll Creek, North Frederick, Monocacy area
frederick.meetingHighlights: Historic downtown recovery community; growing suburban meetings; strong service tradition in Frederick County.
frederick.transitInfo: TransIT buses; Frederick Municipal Airport (FDK); I-70 and I-270 access.
